gpt: The humor in the image comes from the play on words using the names of real places. The cities "Nice" in France, "Fucking" in Austria (though note that the town has since changed its name to "Fugging"), and "Meme" seem to be chosen to create a humorous sentence when read together: "Nice F*cking Meme". The route on the map further emphasizes the joke by suggesting a journey between these places. It's a play on both the geographic names and internet culture (where "meme" is a popular term).
